argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ef0 | |- ( exp ` 0 ) = 1 |
| 2 |  | #P_efvmacl | |- ( A e. NN -> ( exp ` ( Lam ` A ) ) e. NN ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_nnge1d | |- ( A e. NN -> 1 <_ ( exp ` ( Lam ` A ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_syl5eqbr | |- ( A e. NN -> ( exp ` 0 ) <_ ( exp ` ( Lam ` A ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |
| 6 |  | #P_vmacl | |- ( A e. NN -> ( Lam ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_efle | |- ( ( 0 e. RR /\ ( Lam ` A ) e. RR ) -> ( 0 <_ ( Lam ` A ) <-> ( exp ` 0 ) <_ ( exp ` ( Lam ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. NN -> ( 0 <_ ( Lam ` A ) <-> ( exp ` 0 ) <_ ( exp ` ( Lam ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpbird | |- ( A e. NN -> 0 <_ ( Lam ` A ) ) |
